This test creates different sized textures and checks if they're cleared properly.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS Checking texture of size 16x16
PASS Checking texture of size 128x128
PASS Checking texture of size 256x256
PASS Checking texture of size 512x512
PASS Checking texture of size 415x768
PASS Checking texture of size 2048x2031
PASS Checking texture of size 4096x4096
PASS Checking texture of size 50000x68903
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
